title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 19 February 2016 - XWiki
content:

11:47 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
11:55 <tdi> hi, I have FAW items accidentally entitiled with "/" in the title, e.g. 'foo/barr' Now when I click on it, it redirects me to foo/bar, and bar page. I can delete bar, I can delete foo but FAQ items on the list still remain.  
11:55 <tdi> How can I delete them ? I am new to this whole objects/pages idea. Can I just delete it from database tables?  
11:55 <tdi> Will it suffice?  
11:56 <tdi> I tried to allow my tomcat to use / in URIs but it did not help at all.  
12:39 <vmassol> has quit  
12:53 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
12:56 <vmassol> has quit  
13:00 <sdumitriu> has quit  
13:15 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
13:37 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
13:56 <xwiki\_finstern> has joined #xwiki  
13:56 <xwiki\_finstern> hello  
13:58 <xwiki\_finstern> I have some questions about the properties types in xwiki class  
13:59 <xwiki\_finstern> I found the document describing those properties but I couldn't find what I wanted about the types of properties  
14:01 <acotiuga> has quit  
14:11 <polx> has quit  
14:13 <xwiki\_finstern> ok I leave my questions here just in case :)  
14:14 <xwiki\_finstern> For the Static list type, is there a way to edit the text displayed ?  
14:16 <xwiki\_finstern> Other question is a bit longuer to explain : I'm currently trying to add an option in the user profil to let user choose his colorskin setting.  
14:16 <xwiki\_finstern> But my user should not know what the colorskins names are, so I'm trying to give them 2 or 3 choices in a select menu or in the form of radio button choices.  
14:16 <xwiki\_finstern> To do that, I try to use the Static list property but so far, I havn't been able to make it work like when I use the string property, is there a way to do it ?  
14:17 <xwiki\_finstern> For the Static list type, is there a way to edit the text displayed ? like if I want some text displayed in red or italic ?  
14:17 <xwiki\_finstern> thank in advance to anybody that have any answer to offer  
14:29 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki
